fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The team sheet for last Sunday’s England v France rugby union match incorrectly listed Ellis Genge as a Saracens player. Genge plays for the Leicester Tigers (England on front foot for final at Twickenham, 5 December, page 12, Sport). • A recipe for cassata Siciliana cake should have specified 2 teaspoons of baking powder for the sponge, not 2 tablespoons (5 December, page 22, Feast). • A column (I get seasick on dry land, 5 June, page 12, Weekend) referred to a holiday in “Parma, Spain”; that meant to say Palma, Mallorca. • Other recently amended articles include: Cambridge University rejects proposal it be ‘respectful’ of all views Jaguar Land Rover’s Castle Bromwich plant partially shuts until Christmas England’s test and trace repeatedly failed to hit goals despite £22bn cost SpaceX Starship SN8 explodes on landing after test flight ‘A different twist’: how school nativity plays have adapted to the Covid era
